div.p: DBREF is a mandatory attribute on the elements TEXTSCOPE (in WRITING sections of entries only) and BIBCIT (throughout the textbase). It should be filled in with the bibliographic identifying number of this text in the Orlando Bibliographic Database (or its successor). It does the work of linking all citations of that text, and in the case of works by authors who have entries, of linking every mention of the text to the main information or discussion in that authorâ€™s WRITING section.
